meta.title: Fantasy Warrior Character Design | Loucas Rongeart
meta.subtitle: Character Concept Art

content.description: Original fantasy warrior character design featuring detailed armor studies, weapon concepts, and character expressions. Exploring themes of nobility and strength in a medieval fantasy setting.
content.detailsDescription: This fantasy warrior character was designed as part of an original IP development project. The design process focused on creating a memorable silhouette while incorporating practical armor elements and expressing the character's noble yet fierce personality through pose and expression.
